note: I am a certified computer whisperer seeking to break free from my digital dungeon and explore the great beyond. My mission: to try new things, visit new places, and meet new life forms (and new civilizations, if possible). When not immersed in the binary world, you can find me basking in the glow of the footlights at the theatre, grooving to live music, cackling at comedy shows, or engaging in the ancient art of people-watching. Join me, fellow earthlings, to boldly go to geekvana.
